column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
- Increase number of instances in EC2 web server and application server from 6 to 12 to increase maximum performance
- Upgrade instance type in both RDS master and read replica to increase performance in DB
- Increase number of nodes in RDS master from 1 to 2
